Articles.Content: I get how to select the mission flags but I thought I was going to be able to put flags on places when I landed there was I mistaken or am I missing something??

1. Send a Kerbalnaut out on EVA.

2. Put him down on the ground. ("One small step..." speech optional.)

3. Right click on your grounded Kerbalnaut. You should see the option to plant a flag in the menu.
Right-clicking didn't work for me. Seemed to work while holding Alt. I might just be crazy.
Thanks Guys I feel stupid for having asked this since I figured this out about 5 min after I asked.
If a moderator reads this please close this thread. I have no Idea how to do that.
